name: Real Taste of Vietnam 13 days
summary: Connecting travelers with locals through Food and Experiences.
description:
This trip aims to give you an exciting, diverse and well-rounded experience of Vietnamese cuisine. From the historic and hectic Hanoi to the easygoing coastal town of Hoi An and the bustling hub of Ho Chi Minh City (or Saigon, as it is locally known), the binding rivets of Vietnam’s regions is in the love of food. Experience all of Vietnam’s iconic sights, spend time cooking with some of the country’s top food experts and get a true taste of Vietnam!
Tour around Hanoi by scooter and drink at a 'Bia Hoi' (Beer) restaurant and 'party' it up Vietnamese style! Dzo! Dzo! Dzo!
Enjoy a cooking demonstration with Chef to discover the Vietnamese cuisine while cruising on Halong Bay
Visit the Imperial Citadel which was recognized as World Heritage by UNESCO, and enjoy the original and distinctive taste of Hue food
Try the food of the most popular street stalls and hidden alleyways in Hoi An Town in true local style – on the back of a motorcycle
Discovery of rural areas, farming life, and fruit gardens in the immense Mekong Delta with a boat ride along narrow canals and enjoy specialties of the region

startLocation.address: 1-8 P. Lê Thái Tổ, Hàng Trống, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Vietnam

name: Highlights of Vietnam 12 days
summary: From the north to the south, you are given an opportunity to visit most of the must-see and highlight destinations in Vietnam
description:
Begin the journey in north Vietnam with the most locally - unique activities like enjoying the day at a street coffee shop or visiting caves by rowing a boat
'Do-it-yourself' traditional Vietnamese dishes, sunset party with cooking class, and other excursions
Immerse yourself in the peaceful atmosphere of Hue and Hoi An
Squeeze through the tunnels at Cu Chi
Enjoy free time at each destination for your own exploration of the place
Pack up your luggage and join us on this unforgettable journey with lots of amazing memories that are waiting for you ahead.

startLocation.address: Đ. Xuân Thủy, Hàm Thuận Bắc, Bình Thuận 77157, Vietnam

name: Beach Relaxation
summary: Not only take you to the most attractive beaches on the planet, but we can also show you the beauty in the daily life of people in all parts of Vietnam.
description:
If you are the one who really enjoys the great atmosphere from the beach or simply wants a get-away trip from the heat of summer, this tour can give you the opportunity to visit the most beautiful and well-known beach in Vietnam.
Enjoy the seascape while cruising around the limestone islands in Halong Bay
Visit the watery landscape of green fields and sleepy villages fed by the mighty Mekong River
Relax on tropical sandy beaches and make the most of your free time to explore the local life in Phan Thiet

startLocation.address: 1-8 P. Lê Thái Tổ, Hàng Trống, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Vietnam

name: Highlights of 3 countries
summary: There is never an end to the splendor of Southeast Asia on this 3 weeks tour through Vietnam, Cambodia, and Thailand.
description:
It is easy to imagine the wonders of the area before you even step onto the plane, journeying through the jungles and along the famed paddy fields that stretch, rise, and stretch along the hillside. From historic grandeur to modern elegance, flourishing culture to sensational skylines, experience the highlights of Southeast Asia and experience a different world. The closer you come to landing the more excited you feel; the known and secret splendors of Vietnam, Cambodia, and Thailand are close enough to taste. Your well-deserved and truly wonderful holiday has begun.
Enjoy an overnight cruise in Halong Bay in a wooden junk with visits to one of its amazing caves
Discover the complex of Angkor where the vast collection of temples is not just inspiring but breathtaking
Experience the vibrant and diverse cultures of Bangkok where modern edges wrap around its historic beauty giving temples and quiet streets hidden niches to explore
Venture outside of the metropolis to the fabulous city of Ayutthaya, the once storied capital of Siam

startLocation.address: 5 Trường Sa, Street, Ngũ Hành Sơn, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Living the life of Wanderlust in the VN' most beatiful cities
